Package org.drip.state.inference

Class LinearLatentStateCalibrator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.drip.state.estimator.SmoothingCurveStretchParams
      • org.drip.state.estimator.GlobalControlCurveParams
        • org.drip.state.inference.LinearLatentStateCalibrator
  • public class LinearLatentStateCalibrator
extends GlobalControlCurveParams
    LinearLatentStateCalibrator calibrates/constructs the Latent State Stretch/Span from the calibration instrument details. The span construction may be customized using specific settings provided in GlobalControlCurveParams.

    • Module = Analytics Core Module
    • Library = Fixed Income Analytics Library
    • Project = State
    • Package = Inference


    Author:
    Lakshmi Krishnamurthy

        aStretchSpec - The Stretch Sequence constituting the Span
